Package pgrid.network.protocol

Interface Summary
PGridMessage This class represents a interface for all Gridella messages.
 

Class Summary
ACKMessage This class represents a P-Grid acknolegment message.
BootstrapMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap message.
BootstrapReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap reply message.
ChallengeMessage This class represents a P-Grid challenge message.
ChallengeReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid challenge response message.
ExchangeCSVIndexEntriesMessage  
ExchangeIndexEntriesMessage This class represents an exchange index entries message message.
ExchangeInvitationMessage This class represents a P-Grid exchange invitation.
ExchangeMessage This class represents a Gridella exchange message.
ExchangeReplyMessage This class represents an exchange reply message.
FidgetExchangeMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap message.
FidgetExchangeReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid bootstrap reply message.
GenericMessage This class represents a P-Grid generic message to be used with the P2P interface.
GetFile  
GetFileReply  
IndexModifierCSVMessage This class represents a data modifier message.
IndexModifierMessage This class represents a data modifier message.
InitMessage This class represents a P-Grid init message.
InitResponseMessage This class represents a Gridella init response message.
MaintenanceMessage Class description goes here
MessageHeader This class represents a PGrid header
NaFTConnectionRegisterMessage This class represents a P-Grid NaFTConnectionRegister message to be used with the P2P interface.
NaFTConnectionRegisterReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid NaFTConnectionRegisterReply message to be used with the P2P interface.
NaFTConnectionReversalInitMessage This class represents a P-Grid NaFTRegisterMessage message to be used with the P2P interface.
NaFTConnectionReversalInitReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid NaFTConnectionReversalInitReply message to be used with the P2P interface.
PeerLookupMessage This class represents a P-Grid peer query message.
PeerLookupReplyMessage This class represents a P-Grid peer query message.
PGridCompressedMessage This class represent a partially readen message where the header has been decoded but the message is still compressed in a byte array.
PGridMessageImp This class is a helper class for everyone willing to create a new message for P-Grid.
QueryMessage This class represents a Gridella query message.
QueryReplyMessage This class represents a query reply.
RangeQueryMessage This class represents a Gridella range query message.
ReplicateMessage This class represents a Gridella replica message.
RouteHeader This class represent a Routing Header.
RouterACKMessage Class description goes here
SearchPathMessage This class represents a P-Grid message.
SearchPathReplyMessage This class represents a search path reply message.
XMLIndexTable This class extends the IndexTable with XML functionality.
XMLPGridHost This class extends the PGridHost with XML functionality.
 

Enum Summary
MessageHeader.DelegateStatus Different delegation status:
- toBeDelegated: this message has to be routed by an other peer and then sent back to this one.
